info.name: API Documentation for EasyWords APP
info.description: Here you can find detail documentation about API endpoints for EasyWords APP. Currently API supports getting short list of users and getting latest words for display in cards

item.name: Analytics
item.description: Get all statistics data which is need for displaying widgets

request.description: Get all analytics information for displaying widgets

item.name: Authentication
item.description: APIs for managing authentication and getting tokens

request.description: This API endpoint you will use for  changing user password

response.name: validation error

request.description: Using this endpoint you can get Plain token token

response.name: validation error

request.description: Using this endpoint you can get JSON token. This is the main endpoint which you will use for working with third-party apps

response.name: validation error

request.description: Using this endpoint signout and delete current token
Getting authenticated user information
Getting list of words of other users. Currently not implemented.
Creating new word of passed user. Currently this functionality not implemented

item.name: Samples
item.description: List of sample words which we need to autofill words list for users

request.description: User can load samples from specific language to it's own database

query.description: Language which we need to get list of words. Example=DE
Page number if you need to get new list of samples. Example=1

request.description: Get list of samples which we need for import process.
Getting detail information about sample by it's ID

item.name: Settings
item.description: Get settings of currently authenticated user or change setting value

request.description: Get current list of authenticated user with it's key and value
Here you can change any setting value. For this purposes in body params you need to pass key of setting and it's value

item.name: Users
item.description: Getting information about other users in system and profile information

request.description: Receive short list of users for dropdown options. Here we get only ID and name of user.
Get current authenticated user data

item.name: Words
item.description: Main group which is need for different operations with words - getting list of all words, changing status of words

query.description: Language which we need to get list of words. Example=DE
Page number if you need to get new list of words. Example=1

request.description: Get list of words which we need for learning. Getting words with limit which we store in settings.
Here you can create new word. Before saving system will check for existing ford and if it is exist it will throw validation error.
Getting detail information about word by it's ID
Update word information. Currently we get 503 error. Route do not implemented yet.
Here you can remove word through database
Default get request which is need for increasing of VIEWS counter.

variable.description: Need to pass 0 or 1, should we mark this word known (1) or unknown (0). Example=1

request.description: If you mark this word as known, we put current timestamp in done_at column. Also you can mark corrent word as unknown. In this case you should pass 0 as value param

variable.description: Need to pass 0 or 1, should we mark this word starred (1) or unstar it (0). Example=1

request.description: You can mark word as starred in case later to learn only starred words. To makr word as starred, pass value 1. To mark as unstarred, pass 0

variable.description: User ID which we need to copy word. Example=2

request.description: Using this functionality you can create new word for different user. This way system will diplicate word and change user ID to passed one.
Get list of known words
